--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Colin Green <cgreen@d...> wrote:

> Anyway your quest for an environment brings me back to one of my 
> original points which is - wouldnlt it be nice to have a central 
> repository of environment code. Prefereably modified to expose a 
> standard interface (or one of a set of interfaces) that we define for 
> use in EANN/GA type projects.
> 

I agree that having a central repository is a really good idea for
neuroevolution.  Does anyone want to run such a repository?  I could
point the neuroevolution.com domain to it.  I guess it would be some
kind of web page that can accept uploads.

Our Files section on this group is turning into a kind of repository,
but it would be nice to have one generally available to the public,
inclding people not interested in NEAT.

ken
